name: Carrie Wang
text: This is normally our first choice for pizza. However, we called tonight to ask about contact-less pickup, due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Their Twitter account says they offer contact-less delivery and pick-up. When we asked what they are â€¦More

name: Brandon & Rhiannon H
text: Thank you for great pizza and service!!! Always a great experience! Delivery drivers are all kind and friendly. You guys seriously have the best ranch ever!!!!

text:
Great pizza, crust options - round or square!!

Phenomenal salads, fresh ingredients.

name: Kevin Schmall
text: All pizza and no masks makes Jack a poor boy. ðŸ˜‹

name: Jessyca Stief
text: Food was absolutely perfect tonight! Blackjack really stepped up their game! GREAT JOB ARVADA BLACKJACK!!!

name: Mike Kleist
text: Ordered their square pan pizza was absolutely delicious cooked perfectly thank you very much black guy in Arvada on West 64th Avenue

name: Caitlin Sale
text: This is my favorite pizza place in our area. Pizza is consistently delicious, cooked perfectly and not insanely overpriced. I've tried the local chains and Goombas, and Blackjack came out on top by a long shot.

name: ying ma
text: Good service. Quickly delivery ï¼Œand the chicken wings so so so so so good

name: Pete O
text: Pizza just arrived after placing my order an hour and a half ago. The pizza tastes like it was baked hours ago

name: Jake David
text: This blackjack is awesome. Ashley was amazing, and made our pizza and bread sticks perfectly. Love the customer serive and timely fresh pizza toppled with fresh real ingredients that was absolutely delicious.

name: Amanda Parrish
text: My new favorite pizza place in town. Their pizza is awesome. We recommend both the handtossed and pan pizzas. They deliver so quickly. They also offer an option to schedule your delivery. Online ordering made easy and my pizza is always here before I expect it to be....We will be ordering again!.

name: Ocean and Joli Adams
text: I usually prefer BlackJack , stay at a hotel in wheat ridge alot , and after the third time to order pizza from in last month , and your web site never works, forcing me to use Pizza hut n dominie's every time , and same issue tonight , you lost my business pernsnatly, I won't ever try you first again !

name: George Bruning
text: Hands down the best blackjack pizza in the Arvada area!! These Hollywood players  Go the extra mile every single time to help me out!! The pizza is always top shelf and their customer service is out of this world!! If you ever need the pizza in a pinch I would call this location before any other!

name: Sharon Barry Gotwald
text: Good pizza,& love the cheesy bread.I think the pizza can be a little pricey tho,otherwise would order it more often!

name: L Gilliard
text: Good service. Good pizza still applies. An employee took to the next level today. So I'm craving a salad,and black Jackson Michigan cherry salad happens to be my favorite so I stopped in this man stops what he's doing to make my salad â€¦More

name: Josh Jordan
text: We had a comped meal due to the fact that our last order was over a hour later then they quoted time on our previous order.  I had a nice conversation with the manager and I let her know that I understand how sometimes mistakes happen and â€¦More

name: H B
text: I hope I have the right location because the store I ordered from deserves this great review! Iam from out of town, staying in a hotel. I ordered a pizza which was delivered. The pizza was great and the delivery guy was super nice. I feel â€¦More

name: truhrt47
text: Good was ok. Good flavor & service was ok

name: Edgemark Self Storage - Arvada
text: Not many businesses show a genuine concern for taking care of their customers, Jen the store manager, goes above and beyond. I highly recommend that  place an order at her location. They aim to please!!

name: Inez Casados
text: Great food and awesome customer service

name: Mmb Mmb
text: Pizza was good. I got the pizza and ice cream deal on the app. I would have never ordered the ice cream if I knew they made homemade. They advertise it as bluebell ice cream. Definitely not bluebell. The ice cream had a weird grainy consistency.

name: Adrian arzate
text: Great service on the phone and in person young kid in the store did good I did have to drive and pick up my order tried the colfax store again but didn't work out May be I'll just need to drive up that way from now on ...ps great wing's thanks for taking care of me

name: American Monster
text: Awesome deep dish pizza little small for the price but amazing flavor! Great sauce great toppings and all around good food!

name: mitchell brenner
text: Good food and friendly staff as of August 3rd 2019

name: Joseph Eroen
text: I live 10 minutes away to the north and there is no other black jack pizza near me, but I am out of the deliver area... looks like I have to use another pizza place!

name: Tiara Antoinette
text: Front desk ladie I believe Caleste was her name, super polite and professional....

name: John Jerred
text: First time customer, and I was pleasantly surprised.  I was expecting one good pie at those prices, and that's what I got.  Kind of spendy for non-speciality pizza still. Loaded with well prepped ingredients, perfect dough, good sauce, and â€¦More

name: Elizabeth-Mae Husband
text: My boyfriend took me here today just a little bit ago while he was getting a tire taken care of at discount tires. All we ordered was bread sticks with ranch and marinara sauce...the tire was done before we got our order and while we waited â€¦More

name: David Kyllonen
text: Jenn and her staff are truly awesome! Not only is the pizza great, their customer service is off the charts!!!

name: Pam Ewing
text: Two nights ago, on Monday, I ordered an extra large specialty pizza because we were hungry and always eat the leftovers.  The pizza was cold and didn't have any marinara sauce on it.  It had a drop of tomato paste here and there, but that â€¦More

name: Meriah Cordova
text: Candy helped me with an order that was messed up online. Hooked me up. Thank you! You are a muffin. Great customer service!

name: David Jones
text: Great food! Pizza, cheese bread, cinnabread, salads, wings, soda and ice cream. They also make everything fresh every day! The dough, salads, and the ice cream is made "in house" by Blackjack. I definitely reccomend.

name: Mike
text: I called this store asking for the pizza deals the employee on the phone tells me there is no deals on pizza just salads so after getting lied to and then charged 58 dollars i look on my black jack app to find there is a lot of deals and i â€¦More

name: Blake Bostick
text: Very good pizza. Sauce was tasty and great toppings. The hand tossed dough was really good as well.

name: Anthony Lucero
text: Waited over 2 hours and 15 mins for our order...pizza was cold they forgot our soda driver seemed like he was stressed and the manager Allison told us after we called the 2nd time he was down my street 15 mins later I called again and he â€¦More

name: Brenna Garrett
text: The pizza was pretty good, the girl who took my order was very friendly, and the delivery time was....reasonable. The thing that got my is the girl who delivered my $12 medium pizza decided she deserved a $8 tip and ran off with my $20 bill before I could protest. At the very least I will not be ordering from this location again.

name: Christopher Langer
text: Top notch and friendly. Have great deals if you're at Mile High Billiards as well.  Pool and hot pizza with a beer or some cheesesticks and a Jack n Coke. How can you beat that.

name: Mary Walls
text: Fantastic Salads and deep dish pizzas!  I love this place

name: Drew Walton
text: Seems like mixed reviews but I'm all over this place, tonight I used a mail coupon for a FREE pizza (didn't have to buy anything with it) and it was well made crispy outside, good amount of cheese and darn satisfying. 5 stars

name: Fybro -Gal
text: We have been coming to this location for over 8 years and never once encountered a issue.  Great service and great food!

name: Lluvia Zermeno Lluvia Zermeno
text: To many flys like trash cans

name: Domenic DeSoto
text: I ordered a pizza about an hour and 20 minutes ago. BlackJack said 20 minutes ago it would be here in about 10 minutes. "Driver complications". What isn't complicated is the fact that I'll order elsewhere.

name: Matthew Funke
text: Good pizza but large size is like two person size. Seating inside is like some cheap school cafeteria.

name: Rob Fischer
text: Delivery was fast, about 30 minutes. Ordered wings and a pizza. Wings were very soggy and luke cold. Pizza was very undercooked and doughy. Will not be ordering from this spot again.

name: Noel Datko
text: Decent pizza and cheese bread. Worth it with a discount.

name: Glamrock Freddy
text: Extra cheese cooked well-done...yummy

name: Lisa MacAllister
text: Love this place for take out and delivery.  Jalapenos are hot, delicious cinnabread and the staff is friendly and nice.

name: Patrick Gonzales
text: I was very pleased with the food and time of preparation.

name: marco fernandez
text: i order online and on the web and email confirmation say 45 min wait for been delivered but is 2 hours and no pizza i call to see if my order is under way they say in 15 min and nothing i call again after 20 min amd then it say is the â€¦More

name: Ericka Brown
text: Awesome crust! Great pizza and ice cream!!

name: Daniel Thompson
text: If you're not fond of BlackJack's variety of pizza then you won't like their pizza as well as others, since they are a BlackJack franchise. That being said, I find their pizza to be excellent when it's fresh, with the melted cheese â€¦More

name: Dan Eaker
text: Pizza was delivered after 1 hour and 10 minutes when I was told 30. Pizza was cold. Not just warm. It was cold. Called to talk to Laura, the manager, who offered no apology and no solution but $5 off my next order. She was rude on the phone â€¦More

name: Lynzi Lee
text: They were very nasty on the phone. And so over priced. Would not recommend ordering from them

name: Mick Ware
text: They are better than the national chain and as good as you are going to get without going to Beau Jos.

name: shari daracunas
text: I'm a truck driver they delivered to the truck stop here...the calzone was amazing...will definitely order again when I'm in the area

name: E V
text: I've opted to "stick with the home team" on more then one occasion because they are a bit cheaper then other pizza chains. My reactions in the past have been Luke-warm positivity, but the last several times I've ordered from this location â€¦More

:( better check yourselves! Normally awesome

text: Love this place and it's employees!

text: Very yummy, cheesy, hot pizza! And great customer service!

name: Scott Barbich
text: This was our favorite place to eat. I would meet my friends there on a Saturday, get bread branches and an 8" pizza. Now they got rid of both! WTC? At least Dominos is coming out with branches now!

text: Best calzone ever, love the pizza, and the crew is awesome!!

text: Great Pizza! Fast and perfect! Good work

name: Carley Pratt
text: Ordered pizza about 3:30 to make sure it be here by 6:20 pm. It was over a half hour late. I won't do business again.

name: Ksana Uhrich
text: After waiting over 90 min for my order, I drove across the street to pick up my order. The manager told me the driver couldn't find my address, which is literally across the street and they wouldn't remedy their mistake because they were now closed.

name: Todd Williamson
text: 30 Minutes late, Called The store, was told drivers been on the road for a while now, Cold Pizza, On A Saturday Afternoon, The Driver Told Me He Was The Only Driver, Poor Business Decision To Only Have 1 Driver On A Weekend.BYE BYE.

text: Disgusting pizza, overpriced for what it is and a horrible ordering process.
